name: Derelict (itch) (haykeshjohn, haykeshtom)
description:
At the edge of space, you answered the distress call of a station outpost. You ventured in, hoping to collect a reward. Instead, you discovered that the inhabitants are all mechano-insect hybrids. Now, you must fight to survive.

https://github.com/haykeshgames/derelict

Done for Game Off 2021 by a couple of busy dads, as a fun little side project and opportunity to learn and explore more about game development. 

We decided to use Phaser as JS is the language we've been using for work for the last few years and it would not involve trying to learn more about Unity/Unreal/Godot to actually complete a game. Overall we were pretty impressed with Phaser, it was easy to find the resources and tutorials we needed to get the basics in place.
